channel.title: GetCL? help
channel.description:
Hi guys, I want to add the rest of the skill cape requirements to my source, but I don't have the getCL for any of them apart from Attack, Defence, Strength, Range and Magic. How would I go about adding the rest of the skills here and having the script refer to it when attempting to wear that item? Any idea's?
Many Thanks,
Syrillia.[br][size=1]Posted on: 06-11-2007, 00:06:38[/size][hr]Any help?
